mapper.sql: tc.id as id, tc.check_user_id as checkUserId, tc.submit_user_id as submitUserId, tc.submit_time as submitTime, tc.check_time as checkTime, tc.check_type as checkType, tc.check_comment as checkComment, -- check_status, tc.context_id as contextId, tp.context_defer as checkStatus, tp.defer_content as deferContent, su1.nickName as checkUserName, su2.nickName as submitUserName, sv.data_value as checkTypeName, case tp.context_defer WHEN 0 THEN '未通过' WHEN 1 THEN '正常' WHEN 2 THEN '已变更' WHEN 3 THEN '待审核' END AS checkStatusName
mapper.select:
select
from tb_check tc LEFT JOIN tb_plan_context tp ON tc.context_id=tp.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su1 ON tc.check_user_id=su1.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su2 ON tc.submit_user_id=su2.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_value sv ON tc.check_type=sv.id
WHERE 1=1 /*checkStatus为前台传入参数 0表示查询待审核的,1表示查询已审核的,2表示查询审核全部记录*/
and tp.context_defer = 3
and (tp.context_defer =0 OR tp.context_defer =2)
and (tp.context_defer =0 OR tp.context_defer =2 OR tp.context_defer =3)
ORDER BY tp.context_defer DESC,tc.submit_time DESC ,tc.submit_user_id
